title: 3 Barrel Curling Iron Wand TEATTY Hair Waver Ceramic Tourmaline Crimper 25mm 1 inch Temperature Adjustable Heat Up Quickly Waver Iron (Pink)
features: NATRUAL LOOKING CURLS: The 3 Barrel ceramic curling iron is a great tool for creating natural and elegant “S” wave-looking curls that last all day. You can change up your look without any hassle in a few minutes. Especially perfect to use for dating, parties, Weddings, Birthdays, Valentine's Day, or any other important occasions.

HEATS UP SUPER FAST: This Curling Iron 3 Barrel goes from 0 to 410°F (210°C) in just 30 seconds. Unique PTC heater provides faster heat up and unmatched heat distribution. Easily adjust the temperature of the fast heating 3 Barrel Waver Iron Wand according to your hairstyles and significantly shorten your dressing-up time. Easy to give you a fashionable look in just a few minutes and can last a whole day.

HAIR PROTECTION: Imported ceramic glaze coating technology, high-temperature resistance, ceramic technology provides high and even heat while protecting hair, make your hair healthier, natural, and shiny. The heated ceramic produces 6 more times negative irons than just plain older ceramic barrels.Eliminate static&Frizz.Auto shut off after 60 minutes. So that you can get a softer and healthier, shiny and charming hair looking easily, enhance your hairstyle effect.

WORKS ON ALL HAIR TYPES: Whether you have short or long looks, thick or thin, this triple barrel curling iron works like a charm.Two heating settings: 356℉ (180℃) and 410℉(210℃). This triple barrel curling iron goes from 0 to 210℃ (410℉) in just 30 seconds,180℃ (356℉) suit for people with less soft hair and 210℃ (410℉) suit for people with more and hard hair, allow you to choose the correct temperature to suit your hair and to save time to create beautiful "S" waves.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: TEATTY 3 Barrel Curling Wand Iron is is designed with power display, rubber Anti-scalding heat insulation head& isolated metal stents & ergonomic non-slip handle for easy&safety use, Auto shut off, 360 degrees rotatable & tangle-free cord, a 110V-240V dual voltage curling iron is also great for international travel. We provide technical support for customers 24/7, please feel free to email us for any product issues.
